characters.name: Peter
lines: Hey Stewie, ever wonder why Bluetooth is named after a Viking? It is not like your headphones are raiding the fridge for snacks!

characters.name: Stewie
lines: Bluetooth, -a Viking? What's next, -Wi-Fi is a pirate? How does this magical invisible link even work?

characters.name: Peter
lines: Well, Bluetooth is like a secret radio club for your devices. They chat on a special frequency without wires, sharing data like it's gossip at a medieval feast. It's all thanks to short-range radio waves, â€”a bit like having a really tiny, invisible walkie-talkie.

characters.name: Stewie
lines: So my phone and speaker are basically having a radio talk show? Great, just what I needed, more talkers who don't listen to me.
